vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrance.withdraw (patch_8.sol#15-23):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_amount)() (patch_8.sol#20-22)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_8.sol#21)
